info.name: Metasmart API
info.description: API collection for Metasmart - Goal Management Platform

item.name: E2E Test Sequence
item.description: Complete end-to-end test sequence. Run this folder with Postman Collection Runner to test the entire application flow.

exec: pm.test('Goal created with correct data', function () {

body.raw:
{
    "title": "E2E Test Goal - Run 10km",
    "description": "Build endurance to run 10km continuously",
    "goalCategory": "HEALTH",
    "targetValue": "10",
    "unit": "km",
    "motivation": "I want to complete a 10km race",
    "startDate": "2025-01-01",
    "targetDate": "2025-12-31"
}

exec: pm.test('Action item marked as completed', function () {

body.raw:
{
    "name": "E2E Running Template",
    "description": "Template for running goals",
    "defaultTitle": "Run [distance]",
    "defaultDescription": "Build running endurance",
    "defaultCategory": "HEALTH",
    "defaultTargetValue": "5",
    "defaultUnit": "km",
    "defaultMotivation": "Improve health",
    "defaultDurationDays": 90,
    "isPublic": false
}

exec: pm.test('Guardian registered and token saved', function () {

body.raw:
{
    "title": "Run 5km without stopping",
    "description": "Build endurance to run 5km continuously",
    "goalCategory": "HEALTH",
    "targetValue": "5",
    "unit": "km",
    "motivation": "I want to improve my cardiovascular health",
    "startDate": "2025-01-01",
    "targetDate": "2025-06-30"
}

{
    "name": "Running Goal Template",
    "description": "Template for running-related goals",
    "defaultTitle": "Run [distance] in [time]",
    "defaultDescription": "Build endurance to run consistently",
    "defaultCategory": "HEALTH",
    "defaultTargetValue": "5",
    "defaultUnit": "km",
    "defaultMotivation": "Improve cardiovascular health",
    "defaultDurationDays": 90,
    "isPublic": false
}

item.name: Goal Guardians (Owner)
item.description: Endpoints for goal owners to manage guardians on their goals

item.name: Guardian (As Guardian)
item.description: Endpoints for users acting as guardians for others' goals

item.name: Reflections
item.description: Periodic check-ins with smart frequency based on goal duration

body.raw:
{
    "rating": "GOOD",
    "wentWell": "Maintained consistency this week",
    "challenges": "Had trouble finding time on Wednesday",
    "adjustments": "Will schedule sessions earlier in the day",
    "moodNote": "Feeling motivated!",
    "willContinue": true,
    "motivationLevel": 8
}
